input: current date: today, forecast date: 2023-12-03, temperature: 19°C, day: Sunday
output: **Sunday, December 3, 2023**: Well, well, well! If it isn't a delightful December day that feels more like a cheeky spring fling! With a lovely 19°C on the thermometer, it seems the weather gods decided to give us a little warm hug instead of the frosty cold shoulder we typically expect this time of year. 🌞🐻 So, grab your shades and a cozy sweater (because, you know, winter vibes) and get ready to frolic outdoors—maybe a sunny stroll or a picnic with friends? Just watch out for any reindeer trying to steal your snacks; they tend to get a little greedy this time of year! 🎄🦌 Enjoy this splendid Sunday while it lasts; you never know when winter will finally decide to show up and crash the party!
